coref_content: inflation in Brazil be expect to slow to near the official 4.5 percent target by the end of 2016, the countrys central bank say on Thursday, although the countrys central bank signal recent market turmoil may compel the countrys central bank to far raise interest rate. the countrys central bank keep the countrys central bank's benchmark interest rate unchanged at 14.25 percent brcbmp = ECI at a meeting last week, halt one of the world most aggressive rate - hike cycle as the economy sink into recession. in the countrys central bank's minute for a meeting, the countrys central bank say the countrys central bank's inflation forecast for 2016 have drop and be now around the official 4.5 percent target as the economy slump at a fast rate than anticipate. Brazil annual inflation rate be 9.53 percent in August, the government report on Thursday. still, the countrys central bank acknowledge that risk for that outlook have increase follow a recent currency sell - off, leave policymaker ready to act if 2016 expectation bounce back. the recent increase in risk premia, which have affect asset price, require monetary policy to remain vigilant against significant deviation of its inflation forecast for 2016 away from the official 4.5 percent target, the countrys central bank say. in recent week, Brazil currency brl= BRBY have fall to near record low as President Dilma Rousseff fail to plug a grow budget deficit. Brazil be downgrade to junk status by Standard & Poors late Wednesday, and investor fear other agency may follow suit in coming month. the countrys central bank also voice concern over Brazils public finance, say austerity will likely take long to help curb inflation after key budget target be loosen. Brazil economic downturn, Brazil's bad in 25 year, could nudge the countrys central bank in the opposite direction though. economist have be forecast policymaker will start to cut rate next year, take its benchmark interest rate to 12.00 percent at end-2016, accord to a weekly the countrys central bank survey. in the the countrys central bank view, Brazil ongoing adjustment could take long and be more intense than anticipate. gross domestic product be expect to shrink 2.4 percent in 2015, accord to economist in the the countrys central bank weekly poll. the countrys central bank will probably stay in waiting mode, watch the volatility in local market and the discussion on fiscal policy, say Carlos Kawall, chief economist at J.Safra in Sao Paulo. if the countrys central bank do nt see improvement on the volatility in local market and the discussion on fiscal policy and the exchange rate remain too weak for a long time, there be the risk interest rate will be increase again. ( additional reporting by Anthony Boadle ; edit by W Simon and Bernadette Baum ).
tweets_content:
Brazils central bank keeps key interest rate at 14.25%.
The last time the Federal Reserve raised its benchmark interest rate, there was no one to tweet about it  heavy..
Central bank leaves benchmark interest rate unchanged.
➍ Brazils political crisis explained—but even if you get it, there are further complicating matters.  …..
Brazils taxation without amelioration:.
Brazil bans corporations from political donations amid corruption scandal.
.
Brazil Respite Seen Short Lived With Momentum Going Against Real.
Why Brazil Is Not Coming Back Anytime Soon (In 1 Depressing Chart).
Brazil has cut 500,000 jobs since January. Another 2.5m will be shed before the end of 2016.
Battling dysfunctional rates, credit & currency #markets , central bank of #Brazil announced $3bn of direct & indirect balance sheet support.
